abstract: Ned Ryun, the president of American Majority, a Virginia-based group, says  "every day the campaign flounders, it risks hurting the credibility of the movement.''
snippet: Ned Ryun, the president of American Majority, a Virginia-based group, says  "every day the campaign flounders, it risks hurting the credibility of the movement.''

headline.main: A Tea Party Leader Tells Bachmann to Quit
